name: Add Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet rows for new Judge.me reviews
description: Every time a new review is added to your Judge.me, Make will automatically add it to your Microsoft 365 Excel as a row. Here's the [worksheet](https://dnu-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/ivanov_d_donnu_edu_ua1/ETkftV15brNDkckgdPeCdTMBItsiijJ5C--JbnVK76EHMw?e=3TA0GM) used in this scenario.
